name: 2017 International Conference on Sustainable Development and Green Buildings
content: 2017 International Conference on Sustainable Development and Green Buildings (ICSDGB 2017)--Ei&Scopus--call for papers Mar.22-24, 2017 │Suzhou, China Website: http://www.icsdgb.org/ 2017 International Conference on Sustainable Development and Green Buildings (ICSDGB 2017) will be held in Suzhou, China during Mar.22-24, 2017\. This conference is a platform for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Sustainable Development and Green Buildings. We sincerely invite all the researchers, scholars, engineers, students and people are in interested in these areas to take part in ICSDGB 2017\. ●Publication and Indexing All the accepted papers will be included in the conference proceeding, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, IET and other academical databases. Selected papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in international journals. ●Topics (for more topics: http://www.icsdgb.org/CFP.html) Effect of distribution Eco-technology Economic instruments Nutrients removal Quality Engineering ●Paper Submission 1, Papers can be submitted as PDF via EasyChair: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icsdgb2017 2, If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. 3, Contributions must be written in English and report on original, unpublished work not submitted for publication elsewhere. Submissions not adhering to the above specified constraints may be rejected without review. ●Contact Us Ms. Suzy Shi Email: icsdgb@apise.org Tel:+852-30506939( Hong Kong)
